item.title: Mentioned by Fort McMurray Today
item.description:
Hall Findlay talks energy strategy, pipelines
The former MP for the north Toronto riding of Willowdale has held several positions in the opposition shadow cabinet. This is her second run for party leader. In 2006, she garnered the lowest support from party members and through her support behind Stephane Dion. During the 2011 federal election, which officially removed the party from official opposition status, Hall Findlay lost her seat to Conservative Chungsen Leung. Since leaving politics, she has become the chief legal officer at EnStram LP and is an ...
